yax:process.doc: The preference baseURI is used when process has no external input and baseURI is not passed by parameter. default of baseURI: URI of the current directory suppress="yes": pipeline will not be processed.(makes sense, when only config and/or graphic output is desired). suppress="no" or absent: pipeline will be processed. suppress default is "no". standardImplementationWarnings="yes" or absent: yax writes a message when a component with a standard implementation appears. standardImplementationWarnings="no": yax do not write a message when a component with a standard implementation appears. standardImplementationWarnings default is "yes". preferenceValueMessages="yes": yax writes a message when a component with a standard implementation appears. preferenceValueMessages="no" or absent: yax do not write a message when a component with a standard implementation appears. preferenceValueMessages default is "no".

yax:transformers.doc: default="name": this transformer will be default absent: the system default transformer or (if exist) the transformer mentioned within the pipeline will be used. checkTransformerAvailability="yes": availability of all transformers will be checked, logged and a WARNING will be thrown if someone is not available. checkTransformerAvailability="no" or absent: no check will be processed.

yax:foTransformers.doc: !! takes currently no effect !! default="name": this transformer will be default absent: the system default transformer or (if exist) the transformer mentioned within the pipeline will be used. checkFoTransformerAvailability="yes": availability of all transformers will be checked, logged and a WARNING will be thrown if someone is not available. checkFoTransformerAvailability="no" or absent: no check will be processed.

yax:xinclude.doc: baseURI="." current directory baseURI="/" root directory defaultEncoding is placed into the XML declaration of the XInclude result. If source had no encoding attribute within its XML declaration.

yax:pipetrace.doc: automaticOutput="yes": png file of the compressed graphical representation of the pipeline will be written. automaticOutput="no": no png file of the compressed graphical representation of the pipeline will be written.

yax:porttrace.doc: automaticOutput="yes": png file of the graphical representation of the pipeline will be written. automaticOutput="no": no png file of the graphical representation of the pipeline will be written.
